response.name: Model.xml

header.name: Content-Type
header.description: The mime type of this content

header.name: Date
header.description: The date and time that the message was sent

header.name: Transfer-Encoding
header.description: The form of encoding used to safely transfer the entity to the user. Currently defined methods are: chunked, compress, deflate, gzip, identity.

response.body:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<edmx:Edmx Version="4.0" xmlns:edmx="http://docs.oasis-open.org/api/ns/edmx">
  <edmx:DataServices>
    <Schema Namespace="Sitecore.Commerce.Plugin.Carts" xmlns="http://docs.oasis-open.org/api/ns/edm">
      <EntityType Name="Cart">
        <Key>
          <PropertyRef Name="{{ShopperId}}" />
          <PropertyRef Name="ShopName" />
          <PropertyRef Name="Id" />
        </Key>
        <Property Name="{{CustomerId}}" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="{{ShopperId}}" Type="Edm.String" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="ShopName" Type="Edm.String" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="ItemCount" Type="Edm.Int32" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="Totals" Type="Sitecore.Commerce.Plugin.Carts.Totals" />
        <Property Name="CreatedBy" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="DateCreated" Type="Edm.DateTimeOffset" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="DateDeleted" Type="Edm.DateTimeOffset" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="DateUpdated" Type="Edm.DateTimeOffset" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="Description" Type="Sitecore.Commerce.Core.Localized_1OfString" />
        <Property Name="DisplayName" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="FriendlyId" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="Id" Type="Edm.String" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="IsDeleted" Type="Edm.Boolean" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="IsPersisted" Type="Edm.Boolean" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="ListMemberships" Type="Collection(Edm.String)" />
        <Property Name="Name" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="NameSpace" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="SortOrder" Type="Edm.Int32" Nullable="false" />
        <NavigationProperty Name="Lines" Type="Collection(Sitecore.Commerce.Plugin.Carts.CartLineComponent)" ContainsTarget="true" />
        <NavigationProperty Name="Adjustments" Type="Collection(Sitecore.Commerce.Plugin.Pricing.AwardedAdjustment)" ContainsTarget="true" />
        <NavigationProperty Name="Components" Type="Collection(Sitecore.Commerce.Core.Component)" />
        <NavigationProperty Name="Policies" Type="Collection(Sitecore.Commerce.Core.Policy)" />
      </EntityType>
      <EntityType Name="CartLineComponent" BaseType="Sitecore.Commerce.Core.Component">
        <Property Name="ItemId" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="ParentId" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="Quantity" Type="Edm.Decimal" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="UnitListPrice" Type="Sitecore.Commerce.Core.Money" />
        <Property Name="UnitSellPrice" Type="Sitecore.Commerce.Core.Money" />
        <Property Name="Subtotal" Type="Sitecore.Commerce.Core.Money" />
        <Property Name="TaxTotal" Type="Sitecore.Commerce.Core.Money" />
        <Property Name="AdjustmentsTotal" Type="Sitecore.Commerce.Core.Money" />
        <Property Name="Total" Type="Sitecore.Commerce.Core.Money" />
        <NavigationProperty Name="ChildLines" Type="Collection(Sitecore.Commerce.Plugin.Carts.CartLineComponent)" ContainsTarget="true" />
        <NavigationProperty Name="Adjustments" Type="Collection(Sitecore.Commerce.Plugin.Pricing.AwardedAdjustment)" ContainsTarget="true" />
        <NavigationProperty Name="Product" Type="Sitecore.Commerce.Plugin.Carts.CartProductComponent" ContainsTarget="true" />
      </EntityType>
      <EntityType Name="CartProductComponent" BaseType="Sitecore.Commerce.Core.Component">
        <Property Name="ProductName" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="ProductUrl" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="Size" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="Style" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="VariantInventoryDimensionId" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="OfferNames" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="ItemType" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="Color" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="Comment" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="Image" Type="Sitecore.Commerce.Core.Image" />
      </EntityType>
      <ComplexType Name="Totals">
        <Property Name="SubTotal" Type="Sitecore.Commerce.Core.Money" />
        <Property Name="AdjustmentsTotal" Type="Sitecore.Commerce.Core.Money" />
        <Property Name="GrandTotal" Type="Sitecore.Commerce.Core.Money" />
      </ComplexType>
    </Schema>
    <Schema Namespace="Sitecore.Commerce.Plugin.Payments" xmlns="http://docs.oasis-open.org/api/ns/edm">
      <EntityType Name="PaymentMethod">
        <Key>
          <PropertyRef Name="Id" />
        </Key>
        <Property Name="PaymentType" Type="Edm.Int32" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="CreatedBy" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="DateCreated" Type="Edm.DateTimeOffset" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="DateDeleted" Type="Edm.DateTimeOffset" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="DateUpdated" Type="Edm.DateTimeOffset" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="Description" Type="Sitecore.Commerce.Core.Localized_1OfString" />
        <Property Name="DisplayName" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="FriendlyId" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="Id" Type="Edm.String" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="IsDeleted" Type="Edm.Boolean" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="IsPersisted" Type="Edm.Boolean" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="ListMemberships" Type="Collection(Edm.String)" />
        <Property Name="Name" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="NameSpace" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="SortOrder" Type="Edm.Int32" Nullable="false" />
        <NavigationProperty Name="Components" Type="Collection(Sitecore.Commerce.Core.Component)" />
        <NavigationProperty Name="Policies" Type="Collection(Sitecore.Commerce.Core.Policy)" />
      </EntityType>
      <EntityType Name="PaymentOption">
        <Key>
          <PropertyRef Name="Id" />
        </Key>
        <Property Name="PaymentOptionType" Type="Sitecore.Commerce.Plugin.Payments.PaymentOptionType" />
        <Property Name="CreatedBy" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="DateCreated" Type="Edm.DateTimeOffset" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="DateDeleted" Type="Edm.DateTimeOffset" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="DateUpdated" Type="Edm.DateTimeOffset" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="Description" Type="Sitecore.Commerce.Core.Localized_1OfString" />
        <Property Name="DisplayName" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="FriendlyId" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="Id" Type="Edm.String" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="IsDeleted" Type="Edm.Boolean" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="IsPersisted" Type="Edm.Boolean" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="ListMemberships" Type="Collection(Edm.String)" />
        <Property Name="Name" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="NameSpace" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="SortOrder" Type="Edm.Int32" Nullable="false" />
        <NavigationProperty Name="Components" Type="Collection(Sitecore.Commerce.Core.Component)" />
        <NavigationProperty Name="Policies" Type="Collection(Sitecore.Commerce.Core.Policy)" />
      </EntityType>
      <EntityType Name="CreditCardPaymentMethod" BaseType="Sitecore.Commerce.Plugin.Payments.PaymentMethod">
        <Property Name="CardType" Type="Edm.String" />
      </EntityType>
      <EntityType Name="GiftCardPaymentMethod" BaseType="Sitecore.Commerce.Plugin.Payments.PaymentMethod">
        <Property Name="GiftCardId" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="IsValid" Type="Edm.Boolean" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="CurrentBalance" Type="Sitecore.Commerce.Core.Money" />
      </EntityType>
      <EntityType Name="PayPalPaymentMethod" BaseType="Sitecore.Commerce.Plugin.Payments.PaymentMethod">
        <Property Name="IpnId" Type="Edm.String" />
      </EntityType>
      <ComplexType Name="PaymentOptionType">
        <Property Name="Value" Type="Edm.Int32" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="Name" Type="Edm.String" />
      </ComplexType>
    </Schema>
    <Schema Namespace="Sitecore.Commerce.Plugin.Pricing" xmlns="http://docs.oasis-open.org/api/ns/edm">
      <EntityType Name="DynamicPrice">
        <Key>
          <PropertyRef Name="ItemId" />
        </Key>
        <Property Name="ItemId" Type="Edm.String" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="ActiveDate" Type="Edm.DateTimeOffset" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="BasePrice" Type="Sitecore.Commerce.Core.Money" />
        <Property Name="AdjustedPrice" Type="Sitecore.Commerce.Core.Money" />
        <Property Name="TradeAgreementPrice" Type="Sitecore.Commerce.Core.Money" />
        <Property Name="UnitOfMeasure" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="IsSellable" Type="Edm.Boolean" Nullable="false" />
        <NavigationProperty Name="Adjustments" Type="Collection(Sitecore.Commerce.Plugin.Pricing.AwardedAdjustment)" />
      </EntityType>
      <EntityType Name="ItemDetailsForPricing">
        <Key>
          <PropertyRef Name="Id" />
        </Key>
        <Property Name="ItemId" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="BasePrice" Type="Sitecore.Commerce.Core.Money" />
        <Property Name="IsSellable" Type="Edm.Boolean" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="UnitOfMeasure" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="CreatedBy" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="DateCreated" Type="Edm.DateTimeOffset" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="DateDeleted" Type="Edm.DateTimeOffset" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="DateUpdated" Type="Edm.DateTimeOffset" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="Description" Type="Sitecore.Commerce.Core.Localized_1OfString" />
        <Property Name="DisplayName" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="FriendlyId" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="Id" Type="Edm.String" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="IsDeleted" Type="Edm.Boolean" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="IsPersisted" Type="Edm.Boolean" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="ListMemberships" Type="Collection(Edm.String)" />
        <Property Name="Name" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="NameSpace" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="SortOrder" Type="Edm.Int32" Nullable="false" />
        <NavigationProperty Name="Adjustments" Type="Collection(Sitecore.Commerce.Plugin.Pricing.AwardedAdjustment)" />
        <NavigationProperty Name="Components" Type="Collection(Sitecore.Commerce.Core.Component)" />
        <NavigationProperty Name="Policies" Type="Collection(Sitecore.Commerce.Core.Policy)" />
      </EntityType>
      <EntityType Name="AwardedAdjustment" BaseType="Sitecore.Commerce.Core.Component">
        <Property Name="AdjustmentDefinitionId" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="Adjustment" Type="Sitecore.Commerce.Core.Money" />
      </EntityType>
    </Schema>
    <Schema Namespace="Sitecore.Commerce.Plugin.Delivery" xmlns="http://docs.oasis-open.org/api/ns/edm">
      <EntityType Name="DeliveryMethod">
        <Key>
          <PropertyRef Name="Id" />
        </Key>
        <Property Name="PerOrderPrice" Type="Sitecore.Commerce.Core.Money" />
        <Property Name="PerItemPrice" Type="Sitecore.Commerce.Core.Money" />
        <Property Name="PerWeightPrice" Type="Sitecore.Commerce.Core.Money" />
        <Property Name="Cost" Type="Sitecore.Commerce.Core.Money" />
        <Property Name="CostType" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="CostCurrency" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="CreatedBy" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="DateCreated" Type="Edm.DateTimeOffset" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="DateDeleted" Type="Edm.DateTimeOffset" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="DateUpdated" Type="Edm.DateTimeOffset" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="Description" Type="Sitecore.Commerce.Core.Localized_1OfString" />
        <Property Name="DisplayName" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="FriendlyId" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="Id" Type="Edm.String" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="IsDeleted" Type="Edm.Boolean" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="IsPersisted" Type="Edm.Boolean" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="ListMemberships" Type="Collection(Edm.String)" />
        <Property Name="Name" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="NameSpace" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="SortOrder" Type="Edm.Int32" Nullable="false" />
        <NavigationProperty Name="Components" Type="Collection(Sitecore.Commerce.Core.Component)" />
        <NavigationProperty Name="Policies" Type="Collection(Sitecore.Commerce.Core.Policy)" />
      </EntityType>
      <EntityType Name="DeliveryOption">
        <Key>
          <PropertyRef Name="Id" />
        </Key>
        <Property Name="CostType" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="Cost" Type="Sitecore.Commerce.Core.Money" />
        <Property Name="CreatedBy" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="DateCreated" Type="Edm.DateTimeOffset" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="DateDeleted" Type="Edm.DateTimeOffset" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="DateUpdated" Type="Edm.DateTimeOffset" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="Description" Type="Sitecore.Commerce.Core.Localized_1OfString" />
        <Property Name="DisplayName" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="FriendlyId" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="Id" Type="Edm.String" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="IsDeleted" Type="Edm.Boolean" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="IsPersisted" Type="Edm.Boolean" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="ListMemberships" Type="Collection(Edm.String)" />
        <Property Name="Name" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="NameSpace" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="SortOrder" Type="Edm.Int32" Nullable="false" />
        <NavigationProperty Name="ChildDeliveryOptions" Type="Collection(Sitecore.Commerce.Plugin.Delivery.DeliveryOption)" />
        <NavigationProperty Name="Components" Type="Collection(Sitecore.Commerce.Core.Component)" />
        <NavigationProperty Name="Policies" Type="Collection(Sitecore.Commerce.Core.Policy)" />
      </EntityType>
      <EntityType Name="DeliveryComponent" BaseType="Sitecore.Commerce.Core.Component">
        <NavigationProperty Name="SelectedDeliveryOption" Type="Sitecore.Commerce.Plugin.Delivery.SelectedDeliveryOption" />
        <NavigationProperty Name="Shipments" Type="Collection(Sitecore.Commerce.Core.EntityReference)" />
      </EntityType>
      <EntityType Name="ShippingCostComponent" BaseType="Sitecore.Commerce.Core.Component">
        <Property Name="ShippingCharge" Type="Sitecore.Commerce.Core.Money" />
        <NavigationProperty Name="ShippingMethod" Type="Sitecore.Commerce.Plugin.Delivery.DeliveryMethod" />
      </EntityType>
      <EntityType Name="SelectedDeliveryOption">
        <Key>
          <PropertyRef Name="SelectedDeliveryOptionId" />
        </Key>
        <Property Name="SelectedDeliveryOptionId" Type="Edm.String" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="ChildDeliveryOptionId" Type="Edm.String" />
        <NavigationProperty Name="DeliveryOption" Type="Sitecore.Commerce.Core.EntityReference" />
      </EntityType>
      <EntityType Name="LineDeliveryOption">
        <Key>
          <PropertyRef Name="LineDeliveryOptionId" />
        </Key>
        <Property Name="LineDeliveryOptionId" Type="Edm.String" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="LineId" Type="Edm.String" />
        <NavigationProperty Name="SelectedDeliveryOption" Type="Sitecore.Commerce.Plugin.Delivery.SelectedDeliveryOption" />
      </EntityType>
      <EntityType Name="ElectronicDeliveryOption" BaseType="Sitecore.Commerce.Plugin.Delivery.SelectedDeliveryOption">
        <Property Name="EmailAddress" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="EmailContent" Type="Edm.String" />
      </EntityType>
      <EntityType Name="ShipToAddressDeliveryOption" BaseType="Sitecore.Commerce.Plugin.Delivery.SelectedDeliveryOption">
        <NavigationProperty Name="ShippingMethod" Type="Sitecore.Commerce.Core.EntityReference" />
        <NavigationProperty Name="ShippingAddress" Type="Sitecore.Commerce.Core.Address" />
        <NavigationProperty Name="PrimaryDeliveryCenter" Type="Sitecore.Commerce.Core.EntityReference" />
      </EntityType>
      <EntityType Name="SplitDeliveryOption" BaseType="Sitecore.Commerce.Plugin.Delivery.SelectedDeliveryOption" />
    </Schema>
    <Schema Namespace="Sitecore.Commerce.Core" xmlns="http://docs.oasis-open.org/api/ns/edm">
      <EntityType Name="Component">
        <Key>
          <PropertyRef Name="Id" />
        </Key>
        <Property Name="Id" Type="Edm.String" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="Name" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="DisplayName" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="Comments" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="View" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="FriendlyId" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="DateCreated" Type="Edm.DateTimeOffset" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="DateUpdated" Type="Edm.DateTimeOffset" Nullable="false" />
        <NavigationProperty Name="Policies" Type="Collection(Sitecore.Commerce.Core.Policy)" />
        <NavigationProperty Name="Components" Type="Collection(Sitecore.Commerce.Core.Component)" />
      </EntityType>
      <EntityType Name="Address">
        <Key>
          <PropertyRef Name="Id" />
        </Key>
        <Property Name="AddressName" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="City" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="Telephone" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="Email" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="StateProvinceCode" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="StateProvinceName" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="Organization" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="FirstName" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="LastName" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="CountryName" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="CountryCode" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="Line1" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="Line2" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="PostalCode" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="ZoneId" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="CreatedBy" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="DateCreated" Type="Edm.DateTimeOffset" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="DateDeleted" Type="Edm.DateTimeOffset" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="DateUpdated" Type="Edm.DateTimeOffset" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="Description" Type="Sitecore.Commerce.Core.Localized_1OfString" />
        <Property Name="DisplayName" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="FriendlyId" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="Id" Type="Edm.String" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="IsDeleted" Type="Edm.Boolean" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="IsPersisted" Type="Edm.Boolean" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="ListMemberships" Type="Collection(Edm.String)" />
        <Property Name="Name" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="NameSpace" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="SortOrder" Type="Edm.Int32" Nullable="false" />
        <NavigationProperty Name="Components" Type="Collection(Sitecore.Commerce.Core.Component)" />
        <NavigationProperty Name="Policies" Type="Collection(Sitecore.Commerce.Core.Policy)" />
      </EntityType>
      <ComplexType Name="Money">
        <Property Name="CurrencyCode" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="Amount" Type="Edm.Decimal" Nullable="false" />
      </ComplexType>
      <EntityType Name="Policy">
        <Key>
          <PropertyRef Name="Id" />
        </Key>
        <Property Name="Id" Type="Edm.Int32" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="EffectiveDate" Type="Edm.DateTimeOffset" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="Version" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="VersionComments" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="IsVisible" Type="Edm.Boolean" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="View" Type="Edm.String" />
      </EntityType>
      <ComplexType Name="Image">
        <Property Name="ImageName" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="Url" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="AltText" Type="Sitecore.Commerce.Core.Localized_1OfString" />
        <Property Name="Width" Type="Edm.Double" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="Height" Type="Edm.Double" Nullable="false" />
      </ComplexType>
      <ComplexType Name="Localized_1OfString">
        <Property Name="Id" Type="Edm.Int32" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="Values" Type="Collection(Sitecore.Commerce.Core.Parameter)" />
      </ComplexType>
      <ComplexType Name="Parameter">
        <Property Name="Key" Type="Edm.String" />
      </ComplexType>
      <EntityType Name="EntityReference">
        <Key>
          <PropertyRef Name="EntityId" />
        </Key>
        <Property Name="Name" Type="Edm.String" />
        <Property Name="EntityId" Type="Edm.String" Nullable="false" />
        <Property Name="Quantity" Type="Edm.Decimal" Nullable="false" />
        <NavigationProperty Name="Policies" Type="Collection(Sitecore.Commerce.Core.Policy)" />
        <NavigationProperty Name="Components" Type="Collection(Sitecore.Commerce.Core.Component)" />
      </EntityType>
    </Schema>
    <Schema Namespace="System" xmlns="http://docs.oasis-open.org/api/ns/edm">
      <EntityType Name="Nullable_1OfDateTime" />
    </Schema>
    <Schema Namespace="Sitecore.Commerce.Orders.OData.Models" xmlns="http://docs.oasis-open.org/api/ns/edm">
      <Function Name="GetCart" IsComposable="true">
        <Parameter Name="shopName" Type="Edm.String" Unicode="false" />
        <Parameter Name="{{ShopperId}}" Type="Edm.String" Unicode="false" />
        <Parameter Name="id" Type="Edm.String" Unicode="false" />
        <ReturnType Type="Sitecore.Commerce.Plugin.Carts.Cart" Nullable="false" />
      </Function>
      <Function Name="CartList" IsComposable="true">
        <Parameter Name="skip" Type="Edm.Int32" Nullable="false" />
        <Parameter Name="take" Type="Edm.Int32" Nullable="false" />
        <ReturnType Type="Collection(Sitecore.Commerce.Plugin.Carts.Cart)" Nullable="false" />
      </Function>
      <Action Name="AddCartLines" IsBound="true">
        <Parameter Name="cart" Type="Sitecore.Commerce.Plugin.Carts.Cart" />
        <Parameter Name="shopName" Type="Edm.String" Unicode="false" />
        <Parameter Name="{{ShopperId}}" Type="Edm.String" Unicode="false" />
        <Parameter Name="id" Type="Edm.String" Unicode="false" />
        <Parameter Name="cartLines" Type="Collection(Sitecore.Commerce.Plugin.Carts.CartLineComponent)" />
        <ReturnType Type="Sitecore.Commerce.Plugin.Carts.Cart" Nullable="false" />
      </Action>
      <Action Name="AddCartLine" IsBound="true">
        <Parameter Name="cart" Type="Sitecore.Commerce.Plugin.Carts.Cart" />
        <Parameter Name="shopName" Type="Edm.String" Unicode="false" />
        <Parameter Name="{{ShopperId}}" Type="Edm.String" Unicode="false" />
        <Parameter Name="id" Type="Edm.String" Unicode="false" />
        <Parameter Name="cartLine" Type="Sitecore.Commerce.Plugin.Carts.CartLineComponent" />
        <ReturnType Type="Sitecore.Commerce.Plugin.Carts.Cart" Nullable="false" />
      </Action>
      <Action Name="UpdateCartLines" IsBound="true">
        <Parameter Name="cart" Type="Sitecore.Commerce.Plugin.Carts.Cart" />
        <Parameter Name="shopName" Type="Edm.String" Unicode="false" />
        <Parameter Name="{{ShopperId}}" Type="Edm.String" Unicode="false" />
        <Parameter Name="id" Type="Edm.String" Unicode="false" />
        <Parameter Name="cartLines" Type="Collection(Sitecore.Commerce.Plugin.Carts.CartLineComponent)" />
        <ReturnType Type="Sitecore.Commerce.Plugin.Carts.Cart" Nullable="false" />
      </Action>
      <Action Name="RemoveCartLines" IsBound="true">
        <Parameter Name="cart" Type="Sitecore.Commerce.Plugin.Carts.Cart" />
        <Parameter Name="shopName" Type="Edm.String" Unicode="false" />
        <Parameter Name="{{ShopperId}}" Type="Edm.String" Unicode="false" />
        <Parameter Name="id" Type="Edm.String" Unicode="false" />
        <Parameter Name="cartLines" Type="Collection(Sitecore.Commerce.Plugin.Carts.CartLineComponent)" />
        <ReturnType Type="Sitecore.Commerce.Plugin.Carts.Cart" Nullable="false" />
      </Action>
      <Function Name="GetPaymentMethods" IsComposable="true">
        <Parameter Name="cart" Type="Sitecore.Commerce.Plugin.Carts.Cart" />
        <ReturnType Type="Collection(Sitecore.Commerce.Plugin.Payments.PaymentMethod)" Nullable="false" />
      </Function>
      <Function Name="GetPaymentOptions" IsComposable="true">
        <Parameter Name="cart" Type="Sitecore.Commerce.Plugin.Carts.Cart" />
        <ReturnType Type="Collection(Sitecore.Commerce.Plugin.Payments.PaymentOption)" Nullable="false" />
      </Function>
      <Function Name="GetPricing" IsComposable="true">
        <Parameter Name="listingIds" Type="Collection(Sitecore.Commerce.Plugin.Pricing.ItemDetailsForPricing)" />
        <Parameter Name="{{CustomerId}}" Type="Edm.String" Unicode="false" />
        <Parameter Name="date" Type="System.Nullable_1OfDateTime" />
        <ReturnType Type="Collection(Sitecore.Commerce.Plugin.Pricing.DynamicPrice)" Nullable="false" />
      </Function>
      <Function Name="GetDeliveryMethods" IsComposable="true">
        <Parameter Name="shopName" Type="Edm.String" Unicode="false" />
        <Parameter Name="{{ShopperId}}" Type="Edm.String" Unicode="false" />
        <Parameter Name="id" Type="Edm.String" Unicode="false" />
        <Parameter Name="address" Type="Sitecore.Commerce.Core.Address" />
